name: 3rd International Conference on Education, Teaching and Learning
content: The today's world is highly focused on changing the globe and the community for the better, especially as a walk towards sustainability. Therefore exploring novel strategies in delivering education, assessing their strengths and weaknesses, and implementing them within the communities will benefit the human race and sustain the entire earth. The 3rd International Conference on Education, Teaching, and Learning (TEL 2023) which will beheld on 3 - 4 November 2023, is devised to assist this salient mission and will be held as a hybrid conference based in Bangkok, Thailand. The conference activities will plan to envision the effective conveyance of an impactful message to the entire community by building a sound network among the experts and enthusiasts.
